_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Reasons why 'danger' is a term for sensu: Someone who is besotted by sensual greed and shackled by lustful desire
Not freed from dangers in the present life or in lives to come
Reasons why 'suffering', 'disease', 'boi: Someone who is besotted by sensual greed and shackled by lustful desire
Not freed from suffering, disease, boils, chains, or bogs in the present life or in lives to come
The path to freedom from dangers and suf: The origin of birth and death
The ending of birth and death
The result of being freed from dangers a: Gone beyond all threats and dangers
